statements: DELETE FROM suspicious_activities WHERE user_id = 100 AND activity_type = 'Unauthorized Access';
DELETE FROM suspicious_activities WHERE id = 1 AND user_id = 100;
DELETE FROM suspicious_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Phishing' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM suspicious_activities WHERE user_id = 123 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND status = 'pending'
DELETE FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND transaction_type = 'Transfer';
DELETE FROM monitoring_agents WHERE agent_name = 'John Smith';
